auto-pull.desc: Allows user to configure the auto-pull script
auto-pull.tooltip: Configure auto pulling for your machine

config.desc: Allows user to configure its GitHub user settings

push.desc: Allows user to stage, commit and push files
push.tooltip: Commit, stage and push files via interactive console

generate-ssh.desc: Allows user to generate a new SSH key and dynamically add it to its SSH agent on shell startup
generate-ssh.tooltip: Generate a new SSH key (added to SSH agent automatically)

generate-gpg.desc: Allows user to generate a new GPG key

clone.desc: Allows user to clone a repository on his machine

--version.desc: Prints out currently installed package version

pull.desc: Allows user to pull commits from a repository
